item.title: Klarna’s Net Loss Widens After 64% Surge in Provisions
item.description: Klarna Group Plc had to set aside more money for potentially souring loans in the second quarter, a move that put pressure on results ahead of its expected public debut.

item.title: Klarna Cashed In on ‘Buy Now, Pay Later.’ Now It Wants to Be a Bank
item.description: As the payments giant prepares an IPO, it’s trying to persuade millions of consumers to use its debit cards.
